name: First Person Frogger
description:
Touch as many obstacles as you can without dying. Prove you are the ultimate Frogger!

WASD/Arrow Keys: Movement

Space Bar: Jump

To Wall-Run press the WASD/Arrow Keys in the direction of the wall and later jump off to reach the next platform.

Font Used: Palamecia Titling [Downloaded from Dafont]

Skybox: FarlandSkies Asset
